page.title: 01Lizard Peninsula
page.content: Our survey area is on the Lizard Peninsula. It covers parts of the parishes of Mullion,Grade Ruan and Landewednack.It is mostly grassland, heathland and farmland and has a small population.The area is rich in plants and flowers.The climate is warm,wet and windy. Most of the area is on serpentine rock and is flat and treeless.There are some sheltered areas such as the valley at St.Ruan. There is an airfield on Predannack Downs and an old windmill.There is an old manor house at Erisey and a ruined church at Ruan Major.The area is near a number of beaches and coves and attracts many holidaymakers.There are no villages in the block except for Ruan Minor which covers part of the SE corner and it is here that most of the population lives.
